FuncDef:
The link-protocol transport tagged lacp command configures a VPWS/EVPL-bound sub-interface to transparently transmit tagged lacp packets.
The undo link-protocol transport tagged lacp command restores the default configuration.
By default, a VPWS/EVPL-bound sub-interface is not configured to transparently transmit tagged lacp packets.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In an LACP-enabled scenario, a VPWS/EVPL-bound sub-interface cannot transparently transmit received tagged PDUs. As a result, users at both ends on a VPWS/EVPL network cannot communicate. To resolve this issue, run the link-protocol transport tagged command to configure a VPWS/EVPL-bound sub-interface to transparently transmit tagged LACP PDUs.
Prerequisites
A VPWSor EVPL has been bound to an Ethernet sub-interface.
